content: You can $integrate your application with RNS$ using the open-source libraries.
After registering your domain, you can create as many subdomains as you want to.
You can use your RNS domain for different cryptocurrencies.
After registering your domain, you are able to extend the expiration time whenever you need to.
The RIF Name Service is based on protocol specifications that allow applications use the service in a correct way.
The RIF Name Service is developed over the RSK smart contract platform named, thus ensuring security and permissionless control of domains.
RIF Directory is developing $Verifiable Credential$ (VCs), removing the identity providers from the central role.
RIF Directory enables a $Decentralized Identity$ (DID) giving individuals control of their identity attributes.
Trustless $login services$ are a key component of the RIF Directory protocol.
$Single sign on$ (SSO) allows users to browse in an app without re-entering login credentials. RIF is developing blockchain based authentication services.
You no longer have to give up control of personal information to dozens of databases each time you want to access new goods and services with RIF $Self-sovereign identities$ (SSI).
RIF Directory protocol standards are built ensuring $data portability$, thus promoting interoperability.
RIF allows building communities where members can rate each other in order to build trust through $reputation$.
The RIF Directory team is building $Zero Knowledge Proof credentials$ (ZKP credentials). This allows party to prove that he/she is credited of something without transmitting this credential.
Pains of loosing keys will be solved by $key management$ providers powered by RIF.
Let your friends or family be able to use the $social recovery$ functionality to recover your funds.
$Data monetization$ is the process of using data to increase revenue. RIF Directory will provide incentives for data sharing.
RIF Payments is a protocol for scalable crypto payments solutions.
$Lumino payment network$ allows high number of transactions per second, low fees and fast confirmation times.
The RIF Lumino network $invoicing$ feature allows to request for payments to other parities, including payment expiration date, amount and the type of asset accepted.
RIF Lumino team designed a $light client$ node enabling users to connect to the network from their browsers and mobile phones.
link_label: Read RIF Payments light client docs

content: RIF Lumino $network hubs$ enable instant payments all over the world.
The $watchtowers$ provide the RIF Lumino network of an extra security layer, ensuring that all network participants remain reliable.
With RIF Payments you will be able to perform $cross network payments$ with high level of security and portability.
The RIF Payments $cross tokens payments$ protocol is designed to allow paying with any desired asset for a service.
THe $RIF Storage$ protocol is all you need for your decentralised usecases. It is censorship resistant, permissionless, anonymous and fault tolerant.
The integration of RIF Storage services and RIF Name Service allows users to browse sites inside the $decentralized web$.
Use the $RIF Storage libraries$ to connect to different decentralized storage providers.
RIF Storage allows to connect to $IPFS and Swarm$ storage providers seamlessly.
Use the public RIF Storage gateways to connect to the incentivised Swarm test network.
link_label: Use the RIF Storage to connect to Swarm

content: The RIF Storage persistent storage service offers unique decentralized solution for data replication and persistence.
With the SWAP protocol $bandwidth incentives$ you can soon earn RIF tokens when providing your unused storage to the network.
The $RIF Storage incentives$ a motivation to success on long term storage services, putting up security deposits.
The architecture of the RIF Storage will provide secure simple and effective ways to $monitor published files$ in different services.
The infrastructure required to build solutions beyond RIF Storage services is dynamically managed with the $spawning nodes$ feature.
$RIF Gateways$ protocols allow bidirectional data transfers between the blockchain and the outside world.
RIF Gateways is providing $oracle services$ that permit blockchain applications to collect information from external sources.
RIF Gateways $triggers technology$ defines a standardized way to consume blockchain events and trigger actions in external systems.
Keeping your decentralized application synchronized with real-world events is easier with RIF Gateways.
RIF Communications allows parties in a $peer-to-peer$ network to discover each other and establish secure communication channels, with assured anonymity, confidentiality, integrity and authenticity.
RIF Communications is a network of nodes connected through $forwarding Kademlia protocol$.
The $RIF Communications$ solution is all you need to add anonymous decentralized communication functionality to your decentralized application.
$RIF Marketplace$ allows service providers and consumers to meet and engage in a secure and efficient way.
RIF Marketplace inherits the benefits of a $fully decentralized market$: security transparency, censorship resistance, immutability, and self-owned reputation.
RIF Marketplace provides $staking, slashing, and dispute resolution mechanisms$ to ensure all parties fulfill their obligations.
RIF Marketplace will allow to $sell RIF Name Service domains$ in a secure and trustless manner.
RIF Marketplace allows Service Providers and Consumers to meet and engage in a secure and efficient way.
RIF is building $meta-transaction services$ allowing dApps or apps users to create transactions without gas.
The RIF unified explorer will allow to access and manage all RIF services from a unique place.
